text: Sir Anthony van Dyck (22 March 1599 - 9 December 1641) was a Flemish Baroque artist. He was the leading court painter in England in the early 17th century. He is most famous for his portraits of Charles I of England and his family and court. His style of portrait painting was followed in England for the next 150 years. He also painted biblical and mythological subjects. Category:1599 births Category:1641 deaths Category:Flemish painters Category:Knights Bachelor
title: Anthony van Dyck
